jd_information.description: We Urgently required candidate for online sales for Tour and Travel company for Saket  Delhi.Required qualification:Excellent written & verbal communication.Little Experience of online sales.From hospitality industry will be preferred.Candidate From south Delhi will be preferred.JD:2-3 Years of Domestic / International/Mice Tour Packages SalesLittle experience in online sales (preferably but not compulsorily) from hospitality industry. For the above 3 deptt – these can be males or females. Most important for you to understand is we don’t get to meet any customer in person – neither the customer is in India nor the services are in India – so it is all online sales
